name: Rita Adventures 2D
description:
In Rita Adventures 2D, you control Rita, who must save the kidnapped Bogusia (the green dinosaur). To win, you need to defeat the evil Dagar and his guards by planting bombs under them.

-version (arrows) is controlled by arrows, and version 2 is controlled by WSAD -bombs are placed on the space bar and you must not touch the missiles or the guards who shoot them

I hope you enjoy!
